Wariah is a village in Phagwara Tehsil of Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located  from the city of Sultanpur Lodhi,  away from district headquarter Kapurthala.  The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per the constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India).
References
List of cities near the village
*Bhulath
*Kapurthala
*Phagwara
*Sultanpur Lodhi
Air travel connectivity
The closest International airport to the village is Sri Guru Ram Dass Jee International Airport.
